column3: “This is one schizophrenic, bipolar strain. First, it lifts you up and gives you nice burst of energy and motivation for about 20 to 25 minutes, almost like Green Crack or Moby Dick, and then it drops you on your ass on the couch like Master Kush or some kind of heavy Indica, and says stay!"

column2: it makes you super social and talkative
column3: and then you just want everyone to go home so you can watch a movie. Great for do...”"

“Wow very impressed by this hell's fire by skord. The look is amazing. The smell is confusing because it smells mostly woody like coriander and slightly sweet. The smell is light on the nose. Yellow trich covers these yellow and some dark blue buds with tiny minimal neon green leaves hidden among the plush fullness of the nugs. Small few barely visible hairs tucked in the nugs. The trich is dripping off it. The smoke ...”

“I got lost in my shower. I sh!t you not. This strain is *QUALITY*. 

Other than Blue Dream, I can't think of another hybrid that so nicely balances its sativa and indica characteristics—although this one may lean ever so slightly indica, while Blue Dream leans sativa. 

Best of all, I love its versatility. Great for daytime (I practically can't shut up) and evening (have you SEEN Westworld?!) activities.”
“It's punchy.  It's super good
column4: but it just makes me hit people while laughing a lot but not in like a mean way
column5: more like a way to grab someone's attention
column6: but with force. Now I abuse my husband. Grade A smoke bruh." -DV.   -this was my wifes review and I concur it makes her punchy.  Really good though.  Great relaxed high.”"

column3:
“The first time I tried it, I loved the smell at the dispensary so I was convinced to try a couple Gs. I went back the next day and bought an ounce! Beautiful buds, OMG! That did not prepare me for the wonderful sedation I was about to receive.  When you're ready to lay back, relax and forget your sorrows and pains and become one with the wonderful world of couch potatoes, this will rock your world!!
 highly recommend...”
“tru”
“Has my ass glued to the coffee table and my mind is exploding. No pain in my head, like someone is massaging my brain. Im chill And MEDICATED!”
“Kind but hella creepy but in a nice way.”

“Five stars straight across.  Although how this strain works for me and what it affects is almost diametrically opposed to what its effects are for most people.  It doesn't make me euphoric or energetic at all, in fact it's completely the opposite.  For me this is the most powerful sedative I've ever been on.  And I'm talking even prescription drugs such as the benzo's that I've been on at various times for my anxiety...”
“Good smoke, Strong overwhelming body and heady. Early onset just like any other OG strain, Citrusy Diesel smell taste and effects.”
“Amazing flavor, helps a lot pain and inflammation. This one cranks me up in a good way.”
“Great indica to have if you need to chill or sleep despite the name it's very smooth exhale good taste too”
“Kind but hella creepy but in a nice way.”

“This is probably my favorite strain to smoke with friends, as the initial giggly/bubbly effect of it is insanely fun. It totally knocked out my anxiety so mad bonus points for that. After about 20 minutes it completely changes into more of a body high. Such a rollercoaster of a strain.”
“I just got some shatter that was named slightly different, Hell's Fire."  It has very similar effects as some of these reviews.  Very good pain relief
column4: nice high and clear headed and energetic enough to do "stuff."”"

column3: “Helps me push carts on my job. Feelin good and energized. Then I pass out when I get home.”
“Helps me push carts on my job. Feelin good and energized. Then I pass out when I get home.”

“60/40 s/i

Yeah, this one is a heavy hitter.   Instant  deep body relaxation.  Not a heavy sedation per say but more of a tingly numb and relaxed state.   Can be a bit intense but this does not last long.  

This one is a bit heavier than my normal ratios which are usually weighted very heavily on CBD concentrations as I am coming off anxiety meds.  So this was an interesting experiment for me to have a very high THC...”

“Yes - highly recommended. As others have noted a definite one two punch. First euphoric then it brings you down - in a very good way. It's a creeper at first you might think it isn't that strong a moment later you realize that you just lost track of the last half hour. I vaped it, very little taste which  leads to the gross misconception that it might not be very strong - then POW! A new favorite. This review is for ...”

“Dabbalicious x Crockett Family Farms Hell's Fire OG Live Resin Crumble is pure fireeee. Tastes of sweet lemony citrus with subtle hints of diesel and pine. Potent hybrid effects near to even on the indica/sativa side, head in the clouds while body is mellowed out.”
“This is my favorite strain, as well as, OG Kush! Has a great pungent, yummy citrus-y taste!💚🍀💚🍀💚”
“Meh. Just evenly balanced. Will get you high, but there are better strains out there. Wouldn't buy again.”
“earthy and spicy I recommend for afternoon use”

“Have a pain free good time on the strain. It's great for getting the job done. Enough mental motivation while relaxing the pain away. Can't wait to use when I roller skate. If Hells fire feels like this I'm a start doing bad things to get to hell😈”

“I have had some strong strains before but first fatty bowl of this and it flattened me. Instant rush to the head very cerebral high (can make you feel dizzy) and quite energetic actually but has an indica crash that can put you to sleep. The high its self can last for a very long time i would say this is definitely for experienced users. A well balanced hybrid.”
“Was a great hybrid with good THC percentage. The smoke was great, but the effects were lacking a bit. Not a bad daily smoke to get stuff done.”
“I got some hell's fire shatter, its the best shatter I've had! best effects, its very potent and my tolerance is super high and this worked for me! wish I could get this strain every time!”
“Very relaxing strain after a good workout. Definitely recommend after hitting the gym or going for a run.”
“Very Quick Effect. Euphoric High with mild medicated feeling on back end. I was very impressed with this strain.”
“I just remember having a good time while being painless.. top shelf is incredible”

“man this strain is potent. very euphoric and great pain relief. beginners beware most sleepy stains just get me relaxed and not really sleepy this one however is so potent  after every session I just want to eat and pass out😴😴😴”
“Great night time strain. Good uplifting effect. Creating a couch lock Forsure. Still prefer the Tahoe Og but this is next to it.”
“Very nice high, definitely one of my new favorites day or night medicine lot's of Orange in this bud and I could smell the hint of honey amazing all the way around😉”

“HA OG deep pinesol taste 😈 😇 and after taste mixed up w/ Cannatonic Honey oil lemon zest sitting real alert and focused and relaxed would pick up again.
HA flower was glittered out with tricomes grinder was pasted with keef. Pretty impressed w/ strain 😆 godbless peace.”

“The taste.... is awful.  It tastes like I'm smoking the dirt out of the oil change pit at Jiffy Lube.  I'm only one bowl in and I cannot continue to smoke this.  It's like I'm being punished for wanting to get high.”
“Super strong strain so definitely not for the rookie smoker and dont plan on leaving the couch anytime soon after a session! All my top strains are OG and this one doesn't disappoint!”
“Stony tingly crystals moderate but evident light light green and tastes pritty good”
“this was a very good strain for the price I paid for it... very mellow and relaxing... would get it again...”
“Nothing ever gets me high besides wax now, but this flower is just fucking <3”
“If your looking to experience insanity in it's completeness, look no further than this strain....Oh F'ck, help me, help me might also be a good name for this strain.”
“wow this was the perfect stain to replace holy grail with , its very sticky light green and heaths of gasoline and tennis balls thankyou kathy for this selection (:”
“Kind but hella creepy but in a nice way.”
“earthy and spicy I recommend for afternoon use”
“grade-a smoke, had me more uplifted than anything I've smoked in a minute, had me giggling for the first time in forever. super frosty white nugs with a sour kushlike aroma.”
“This is my favorite strain, as well as, OG Kush! Has a great pungent, yummy citrus-y taste!💚🍀💚🍀💚”
“I love this! I honestly give no f#*k right now! Very nice taste and feel.”

“This is a fast growing strain for a reason. Although there is plenty of THC the fast yield leads to smaller herbs. Don't  expect a crusher nug, bigger then a gram and a 1/2. However, the creative side with your initial smoke is impressive, I did all my laundry while taking bong rips. I really got it all done, then I crashed after eating a bag of herb candy. Watch out for the crash about 20 after smoking just saying i...”
“picked up some hell's fire shatter from my local dispensary. I am blown away by the great taste and high .”
“My favorite strain at my favorite dispensary. Love this for its exceptional head high. They're not kidding when you see the euphoria" rating bar maxed out.”"
“Intense og. Not the strongest but one of the better balanced. Real nice taste and smell. Buds are beautiful green. And nice size.”
“This was a very potent extract. It was labeled as pure Indica, and had something around 95% thc content. Highly recommended!”

“This flower is just beautiful. Some of the best tree I've had in AWHILE. Insanely potent effects. I'm a veteran Stoner and half a Joint put me on the couch 
for 4 hours. Outstanding 9/10”

“Have a pain free good time on the strain. It's great for getting the job done. Enough mental motivation while relaxing the pain away. Can't wait to use when I roller skate. If Hells fire feels like this I'm a start doing bad things to get to hell😈”
“Meh. Just evenly balanced. Will get you high, but there are better strains out there. Wouldn't buy again.”
“This is a great weed for road trips makes everything 10x more interesting lol has awesome flavor and really nice high. Works for pain from sitting or walking to long :)”
“great tasting. smelling. very euphoric feeling, cerebral but still relaxing. could be a bit too much in large doses. not for first timers for sure. got mine from the jungleboys over at TLC la”
“Love this strain. I have a high tolerance, so yeah, it was great for everything I need it for. Relaxed my muscles, restored my appetite, just made me feel great again.”
“Got a great cut from the homey Coco's Extracts in Flint MI. Very pungent and earthy OG fuel.”
“Trust me when when I say, I was inda couch, and over all it was a dope smoke.”
“grrrr stinky sweet smell taste. good 4 both day n night time use.  love the citrus smell when you 1st grind it. very quick euphoric buzz”
“love this strain, very smooth and relaxing smoke.”
“Ok taste decent smell”
